item.title: Linux命令 irc
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: Irssi commands: accept die knock notice sconnect unload action disconnect knockout notify script unnotify admin echo lastlog op scrollback unquery alias eval layout oper server unsilence away exec links part servlist upgrade ban flushbuffer list ping set uptime beep foreach load query sethost userhost bind format log quit silence ver cat hash lusers quote squery version cd help map rawlog squit voice channel hilight me recode stats wait clear ignore
